card.name: Shopping
card.description: Draw cards until their {{COST}} is 10 or higher (up to 7 cards in hand)

description.now: Draw cards until their {{COST}} is 10 or higher (up to 7 cards in hand)
description.prev: Spend all of your {{GOLD}}. Summon a copy of a monster from your deck costing your {{GOLD}} or less if no target.
